text: Christopher Javaughn Alexis (born 1 May 1996) is a Grenadian road cyclist who is the 2016 Grenada Cycling Federation’s (GCF) National Cycling Champion. ==Career achievements== ===Results 2017=== Cat C – Wichita Falls, TX 9th — Veulta del Viento ITT — Collegiate Cat C – Wichita Falls, TX 7th — Veulta del Viento Road Race — Collegiate Cat C – Wichita Falls, TX 8th — Aggieland Omnium — Collegiate Cat C – College Station, TX 9th — Aggieland Omnium ITT — Collegiate Cat C – College Station, TX 7th — Aggieland Omnium Road Race — Collegiate Cat C – College Station, TX 4th — Rice University Omnium — Collegiate Cat C – Houston, TX 3rd — Rice University Crit — Collegiate Cat C – Houston, TX 15th — Rice University ITT — Collegiate Cat C – Houston, TX 4th — Rice University Road Race — Collegiate Cat C – Houston, TX 25th — Arkansas Classic Omnium — Collegiate Cat C – Fayetteville, AR 25th — Arkansas Classic Crit — Collegiate Cat C – Fayetteville, AR 23rd — Arkansas Classic ITT — Collegiate Cat C – Fayetteville, AR 21st — Arkansas Classic Road Race — Collegiate Cat C – Fayetteville, AR 1st — Louisiana State University Omnium — Collegiate Cat D – Baton Rouge, LA 2nd —
